Solutions

Migrating Legacy Reporting Framework

Was part of solutioning and development team that migrated Reporting solution from OLTP system to Datawarehouse using skills of ETL, Data modelling, Query Optimization, Datalake Storgae and Spark with help of tools like ADF, Databricks, ADLS2, Azure SQL and Azure Synpase. This helped orgnization to reduce load on primary system and provide better performing reports.

Extraction Solution

Was part of solutining and development team that provided Data in form of AVRO, ORC, Parquet and CSV to different customer on SFTP, Azure Blob and ADLS2. Source was hihgy normalized data of OLTP system that clients needed for running their own analytics, As part of solution we provided semi denormalized data of different modules in set frequency. Skills used were Azure Datafactory, Azure Databricks, Azure Storage, Encryption and Compression.

Multiple POCs

Evaluated Snowflake, Azure Datawarehouse and Azure Datafactory gen 1 to check feasibility for migrating reporting view and SSIS ETL jobs.

Quick Utilities

Using SSIS as a ETL tools created few small utilities for internal teams to read data from multiple excel, apply fuzzy logic and based on multiple activites out to be stored in Local Databases. Data then used by team members to generate quick reports. This helped in reducing manual work for individual member from 5-8 hours to 1 hour daily.

Hotel Search Logic

For Travel based company, written business logic in Stored procedure that will take multiple input parameters for hotel search criteria and return result of offline hotels data stored in client's database by evaluating blockout dates, special dates, holidays and weekends rate.

Semi Strcutured to Tabular

As part of multiple requirements, have used Json and XML parser to parse string coming in as a Stored proc parameters and then converted to tabular format to insert into normalized database system while maintaining Integraty, transaction and error handling.
